data.lyric:
[ti:One Night Standards]
[ar:Ashley McBryde]
[al:One Night Standards]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]One Night Standards - Ashley McBryde
[00:05.96]Lyrics by：Ashley McBryde/Nicolette Hayford/Shane McAnally
[00:11.92]I ain't gonna stay for the weekend
[00:15.04]I ain't gonna jump off the deep end
[00:18.12]I ain't gonna ask where your ring is
[00:20.85]Thing is we all got secrets
[00:24.98]You don't wanna hear about my last break up
[00:28.04]I don't wanna worry 'bout space you take up
[00:31.11]I don't even care if you're here when I wake up
[00:36.55]It's just a room key
[00:39.31]You ain't gotta lie to me
[00:42.35]Can't you just use me like I'm using you
[00:49.16]How it goes is bar closes
[00:52.16]There's no king bed covered in roses
[00:55.05]Just a room without a view
[01:01.91]I don't want a number you ain't gonna answer
[01:04.90]Let's just stick to the one night standards
[01:13.39]Well I ain't Cinderella but who is
[01:16.49]Call me what you want if the shoe fits
[01:19.59]I ain't gonna say I never do this
[01:22.17]'Cause truth is lonely makes a heart ruthless
[01:26.51]Ain't nobody gonna hurt nobody
[01:29.68]Ain't nothing wrong with needing somebody
[01:32.73]You can leave all that down in the lobby
[01:37.80]It's just a room key
[01:40.70]You ain't gotta lie to me
[01:43.84]Can't you just use me like I'm using you
[01:50.71]How it goes is bar closes
[01:53.64]There's no king bed covered in roses
[01:56.48]Just a room without a view
[02:02.76]No I don't want a number you ain't gonna answer
[02:06.48]Let's just stick to the one night standards
[02:21.63]How it goes is bar closes
[02:24.38]There's no king bed covered in roses
[02:27.26]Just a room without a view
[02:33.45]No I don't give a d**n about the morning after
[02:37.27]Bottles on the floor don't even matter
[02:40.32]I don't want a number you ain't gonna answer
[02:43.38]Let's just stick to the one night standards
[02:47.88]The one night standards
[02:54.21]The one night standards
data.trans:
[ti:One Night Standards]
[ar:Ashley McBryde]
[al:One Night Standards]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.96]//
[00:11.92]我没有打算留下来度过周末
[00:15.04]我不会深陷这段关系
[00:18.12]我也不会问你的结婚戒指在哪里
[00:20.85]我知道我们彼此都有心事
[00:24.98]你并不想知道我的上一段恋情
[00:28.04]我也不会在意你占据我的空间
[00:31.11]我根本不在乎当我醒来后 你会不会在我身旁
[00:36.55]只是房间的钥匙而已
[00:39.31]你不用费尽心思骗我
[00:42.35]你可以安心利用我 如同我对你的利用
[00:49.16]现在该怎么办 酒吧已经打烊
[00:52.16]大床上也没有铺满玫瑰花瓣
[00:55.05]只是一个普通的房间 窗外没有任何美景
[01:01.91]我不想要你的号码 反正你也不会接通电话
[01:04.90]就让我们享受这一夜的情缘吧
[01:13.39]我不是灰姑娘 那谁是呢
[01:16.49]如果合适的话 请与我联络
[01:19.59]我不会撒谎 说我从未做过这样的事
[01:22.17]因为寂寞会让人的心变得冷漠无情
[01:26.51]这样做的话没有人会受伤
[01:29.68]需要别人的陪伴并没有错
[01:32.73]你可以把所有担忧都留在大厅里
[01:37.80]只是房间的钥匙而已
[01:40.70]你不用费尽心思骗我
[01:43.84]你可以安心利用我 如同我对你的利用
[01:50.71]现在该怎么办 酒吧已经打烊
[01:53.64]大床上也没有铺满玫瑰花瓣
[01:56.48]只是一个普通的房间 窗外没有任何美景
[02:02.76]我不想要你的号码 反正你也不会接通电话
[02:06.48]就让我们享受这一夜的情缘吧
[02:21.63]现在该怎么办 酒吧已经打烊
[02:24.38]大床上也没有铺满玫瑰花瓣
[02:27.26]只是一个普通的房间 窗外没有任何美景
[02:33.45]我并不在乎第二天会如何
[02:37.27]酒瓶散落在地也没关系
[02:40.32]我不想要你的号码 反正你也不会接通电话
[02:43.38]就让我们享受这一夜的情缘吧
[02:47.88]这一夜的情缘
[02:54.21]这一夜的情缘
